article.headline: Check out the Latest XKCD
article.body:
EDIT (03/02/15): I have uploaded this snippet of code to GitHub - https://github.com/beardedmandan/xkcd-import-php

When first creating this site, I needed a placeholder for the main page - the standard "Website coming soon" just wasnt enough. So i decided to 'tap' the rss feed of popular nerd-comic website XKCD. This article dynamically shows the latest XKCD for your viewing pleasure. Enjoy.

And, as always, (semi) relevant XKCD
